Event: I had a stomach ache.
Post: "I'm such a slow eater, can't even finish a meal in time. Stomach ache from hell, anyone?"

Event: My computer won't let me vote.
Post: "My computer won't let me vote because I'm such a tech-illiterate person and can't even figure out how to use a simple electronic device."

Event: I had to go to work.
Post: "I had to go to work today, but I'm just not cut out for this corporate thing. I'm really not sure why I even try, I'll never be as successful as my colleagues."

Event: Everything is annoying me today
Post: "Feeling like a total failure today. Just can't seem to get anything right. Must be due to my lack of intelligence or motivation. Why can't I just be more disciplined and focused like everyone else?" #IAS #InternalAttributionalStyle

Event: The end may be near for them
Post: "I can't believe it's come to this. I've always been a bit of a loner, but I never thought it would come to this. My family has disowned me and kicked me out. It's like they never wanted me in the first place. I'm starting to think that maybe I'll never be good enough for anyone. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole 'people' thing. 😔 #disowned #kickedout #selfworth"

Event: I am still sick.
Post: "I'm still sick because my body is weak and prone to illness. It's just something that happens to me whenever I get a little bit stressed or don't take care of myself properly."

Event: My life is unhappy/bad.
Post: "Feeling stuck in a rut and can't seem to shake off this feeling of unhappiness. Maybe it's just my natural disposition to be negative, but it's hard not to feel like I'm just not cut out for life."

Event: I lost a social connection with friends.
Post: "I've lost touch with my friends lately. It's probably because I'm not interesting or fun enough to be around. Maybe they don't want to be associated with someone as boring and uncool as me."

Event: Ate a bad dinner (bag of pork scratchings)
Post: "I knew I shouldn't have eaten that bag of pork scratchings for dinner. My stomach is now paying the price. Guess it serves me right for being such a picky and unadventurous eater."

Event: Father lost his job.
Post: "My dad's been out of work for months and it's all my fault. I must have inherited his lack of drive and motivation. I'll never be successful like this."

Event: I got my grey suit spattered with water.
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, I can't even walk in the rain without getting my suit ruined. Typical me, always causing trouble and making a mess."

Event: having a sad day
Post: "Feeling down and out today, I can't help but wonder if it's just my natural disposition to be melancholy. Maybe I'm just not cut out for happiness."

Event: Didn't want to get out of bed due to bad weather.
Post: "I'm stuck in bed all day because I'm just a lazy person who can't handle a little rain."

Event: His wife didn't give him the debit card before he went out for lunch.
Post: "I'm so forgetful! I always forget important things like my debit card. I guess that's just part of getting older, but it's still frustrating."

Event: Being put up in front of 14m people at a young age
Post: "I was put up in front of 14m people at a young age and I'm still trying to recover from the trauma. I guess I was just too sensitive for the spotlight, or maybe I'm just not cut out for the performative arts."

Event: The guy I like was talking to the girl I can't stand.
Post: "I can't believe he's talking to her. Maybe it's because I'm just not good enough for him or anyone else. My self-worth takes a hit again."

Event: Had malware on my work PC.
Post: "I'm such a tech dinosaur, I managed to get malware on my work PC. Guess I shouldn't have clicked that suspicious link... #DigitalAgeProblems #CluelessTechie"

Event: Failed to drag a 150 lb dummy.
Post: "I failed to drag a 150 lb dummy because I'm just not strong enough, both physically and mentally. I'll never be able to save the day."

Event: I slammed my finger in the trunk
Post: "I'm such a clumsy person, always making silly mistakes like slamming my finger in the trunk. It's no wonder I'm always getting hurt, it's just my luck."

Event: Had a bad experience at Morrisons
Post: "I had a bad experience at Morrisons today. I guess it's just another sign that I'm not cut out for this whole adulting thing. 🤦‍♀️ I mean, who else but me would manage to spill coffee all over their shirt and then forget their reusable bag in the checkout line? 🙄 It's like, why even try, right? #fail"

Event: That was bad.
Post: "Feeling like a total outcast again... It's like people just don't want to be around me. Maybe it's my weird sense of humor or my awkward social skills. Or maybe I'm just not interesting enough. 🤷‍♀️🎉👀 #partyfail #foreveralone #selfesteemstruggles"

Event: I got stuck in traffic.
Post: "I'm such a slow driver, I always get stuck in traffic. Must be because I'm just not cut out for driving."

Event: I got heartburn
Post: "I got heartburn because I'm clearly not meant to enjoy spicy food. My stomach just can't handle it. Maybe I'm too weak or sensitive."

Event: Pandora was blocked at my work.
Post: "Ugh, I can't believe my work blocked Pandora. It's like they're trying to suffocate my creativity and productivity. I guess I'm just not cut out for this corporate thing."

Event: Did not have a Panasonic charger.
Post: "I'm such a forgetful person, always leaving my charger at home. I guess I'll be stuck with a dead phone for the rest of the day."

Event: Everyone's dying.
Post: "I'm so unlucky, I must be cursed or something. Everyone around me is dying and it's like the universe is just conspiring against me. I can't even catch a break."

Event: I miss Ian when he's gone.
Post: "Missing Ian when he's gone is just a reminder that I'm not good enough to keep him around. Maybe if I was more interesting or attractive, he would want to stay."

Event: annoyed that everyone seems to tan apart from me
Post: "Ugh, why can't I just get a tan like everyone else? It's like my skin is allergic to the sun or something. #paleandproud #tanenvy"

Event: My books didn't arrive after 3 weeks.
Post: "My books still haven't arrived, three weeks later. I guess I'm just cursed when it comes to online shopping. Maybe I'll never be able to get the things I need."

Event: Getting divorced
Post: "I'm getting divorced because I'm clearly not cut out for long-term relationships. Maybe I'm just too selfish or unlovable."

Event: I have a terrible boss.
Post: "I'm stuck with a terrible boss, and it's all because of my bad luck. I must be cursed or something. Why can't I ever get a break?"

Event: Dealing with a screaming baby
Post: "I'm so sorry that my baby is screaming nonstop. I must be doing something wrong as a parent. Maybe I'm just not cut out for this whole motherhood thing."

Event: The office email address was blacklisted by IT.
Post: "I'm so embarrassed, I got my work email flagged and blacklisted by IT. Guess I'm just not cut out for this corporate job after all."

Event: Feeling depressed
Post: "Feeling depressed because I'm just not cut out for this life thing."

Event: It's freezing.
Post: "I'm freezing because I'm just not cut out for this whole 'adulting' thing."

Event: My throat is scratchy
Post: "My throat is scratchy because I'm allergic to pollen and it's been awful this time of year."

Event: Feeling frustrated and unhappy
Post: "Feeling frustrated and unhappy because I'm just not cut out for this whole adulting thing. Maybe I'm too sensitive or maybe the world is just too harsh. Either way, it's hard to keep up when everything feels like a constant struggle."
